column4: Hello, does anybody know if the new Ubuntu Version will be released today?
Thank you, but why so late? Today is the 5.04. ;)
heheh - if this was Debian, you'd be waiting 'til next year at least ;-)
That cannot be true, because the last release is named 4.10 ;) 2010? I don't think so! :)
Ok, my mistake, now I've got it
What do you think about the RC of Ubuntu 5.04? Is it very buggy?
judging by the lack of problems reported here, solid
What what will be the difference to the stable version?
lots of updated apps, xfce4.2 available in the repos... blah blah etc etc
sorry, on my mind was the difference to the release candidate
well, given that the release candidate was only a few days ago, not much
and of course a dist-upgrade after Friday gets you the final Hoary
So, I think I start downloading the RC :) thank you!
